attributes.action: Introduce proportional voting system and elected second chamber.
attributes.additional_details:
There is a way Brexiters could really hand back control to voters. Caroline Lucas, Guardian, 24/06/2016.  

Electoral Reform Society http://www.electoral-reform.org.uk/proportional-representation

This referendum puts voting reform right back at the top of the agenda, Polly Toynbee, Guardian, 23/06/2016 

https://yougov.co.uk/news/2015/12/12/proportional-representation-and-eu-referendum/
attributes.background: I'm devastated both by the EU referendum result, and by the opinions voiced by those on either side against the other. Rather than call for a second referendum, make a difference by ensuring that all people's voices are heard through a system of proportional representation. This will unite us.
